title: Apple iMac 24" All-In-One Computer, Apple M1, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, Mac OS, Pink
description: Studio quality three mic array for crystal clear calls and voice recordings. Six-speaker sound system for a remarkably robust and high-quality audio experience. Up to 256GB of ultrafast SSD storage. Two Thunderbolt USB 4 ports and up to two USB 3 ports. Ultrafast Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 wireless. Color matched Magic Mouse with Magic Keyboard or Magic Keyboard with Touch ID.
